vclaim: The Make-a-Wish Foundation apologized for sending Drake & Josh star Drake Bell to visit a terminally ill boy, after the boy had requested a visit from the rapper Drake.
title: Did Make-a-Wish Apologize for Sending the Wrong Drake to Visit a Terminally Ill Boy?
subtitle: A parody account tricked Twitter users with a darkly comic video about a fictional mix-up.
author: Dan MacGuill
